text: The District Industries Centre in association with the Tiruchi District Tiny and Small Scale Industries Association will organise a special consultative meet for entrepreneurs and raising awareness on entrepreneurship on the Shivani Engineering College campus at Pulangulathupatti near the city on Monday. The meeting would seek to raise awareness on Urban Youth Employment Guarantee Programme and the subsidy available under the scheme for starting new ventures. The meeting would be held at the college campus at 3 p.m. on Monday. Interested candidates can contact the TIDITSSIA office at Ariyamangalam by calling 0431-2440119 or 2440114 for more details, S. Punniyamurthy, Secretary, TIDITSSIA, said in a release.
title: Consultative meet for entrepreneurs
